entry.title: Tuesday: A few clouds. High minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 47 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
